Question: Shenzhen Runchengda Electric Technology Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Runchengda Electric Technology Co.,Ltd

CES 2024

- Leading provider of intelligent electric vehicle charging piles and digital energy solutions
- Offers charging/energy storage equipment and energy management platforms for various scenarios
- Key technologies include liquid-cooled ultra-fast charging, flexible charging, and Vehicle-to-Grid (V2G)
- Funds raised for product R&D, enhancing production capacity, comprehensive energy services, new project development, expansion into overseas markets, and talent recruitment
- Aims to achieve comprehensive coverage in more than 30 provinces and autonomous regions in China, as well as over 100 cities
